explains: n. 机器人程序；机器人（常见于科幻小说中）；不断借债的人，经常乞讨的人；马蝇的幼虫

sentences.en: Ciliv is selling the efficacy of so-called build-operate-transfer (BOT) operations.
sentences.cn: 瑟利夫正在大力宣扬被称之为“建设—经营—移交”（BOT) 模式的效力。

sentences.en: The emerging system through which private companies maintain toll roads in some states is a classic BOT model.
sentences.cn: 私营公司在一些州维护收费公路的新兴系统是典型的 BOT 模式。

sentences.en: Every time Funny Bot throws out a catch phrase ("Oh Lawd, this chicken sho' is hot!"), someone hands him a dollar.
sentences.cn: 每次 Funny Bot 说出一句口语化的话 ("Oh Lawd， this chicken sho' is hot!") ，就会有人递给他一美元。
